### The Elves-Dragon War (400 Years Ago)

| Phase | Event |
|-------|-------|
| **The Crime** | Drow capture and torture dragons, trying to force bonds |
| **The Mistake** | Elder dragons blame elves (riders were elves) |
| **The War** | 35 days of devastating conflict |
| **The Survivors** | Only [Thaelen Ruincalen](/npcs/thaelen-ruincalen) and [Thorongil (Vaethor)](/npcs/thorongil-vaethor) maintain their bond |
| **The Discovery** | Years later, truth revealed: drow caused everything |
| **The Response** | Emperor Valandor decrees genocide against all drow |

**See:** [The Elves-Dragon War](/history/the-elves-dragon-war)

---

### The Broken Isles (~300-118 Years Ago)

| Date | Event |
|------|-------|
| **~300 years ago** | First refugees flee persecution to the Broken Isles; [Vaelith Draegor](/npcs/vaelith-the-storm-draegor) escapes the Vel'thara massacre, finds *Sorrow*, begins his solitary war |
| **~200 years ago** | Refugee waves intensify as drow genocide continues |
| **~118 years ago** | Empire sends purge fleet to destroy pirate havens |
| **~118 years ago** | Battle of the Broken Straits—Empire fleet destroyed |
| **~118 years ago** | Confederation founded, Vaelith refuses crown |
| **~60 years ago** | Saltmere founded as commercial capital |

**See:** [History of the Broken Isles](/history/history-of-the-broken-isles)

---

### The Founding of Veraheim (80 Years Ago)

| Phase | Event |
|-------|-------|
| **The Crisis** | Mountain pass collapsing, lives at risk |
| **The Meeting** | [Thaelen Ruincalen](/npcs/thaelen-ruincalen) meets [Vera Wyrdweaver](/npcs/vera-wyrdweaver) |
| **The Choice** | They save lives together instead of fighting |
| **The Love** | Dragon rider and sorceress fall in love |
| **The Hunt** | Both empires send forces to capture them |
| **The Split** | Vera tears the mountain apart in her rage |
| **The Result** | [Veraheim](/factions/veraheim-the-sanctuary) born—sanctuary for the rejected |

**See:** [The Founding - 80 Years Ago](/history/the-founding-80-years-ago)

---

### Recent History

| Date | Event |
|------|-------|
| **~20 years ago** | [Gorrath Bloodstone](/npcs/gorrath-bloodstone) unites orc clans on Stormcrag |
| **~19 years ago** | [Delara Silvertongue](/npcs/delara-silvertongue) becomes First Merchant of Saltmere |
| **~18 years ago** | [King Aldric Greymont](/npcs/king-aldric-greymont) takes the Aloria throne |
| **~12 years ago** | Forge Marshal Kethrak takes power in Ironhold |
| **~3 years ago** | [Graza Bloodtide](/npcs/graza-bloodtide) becomes Pirate Queen |

---

### Present Day

| Power | Status |
|-------|--------|
| **Thelassian** | Valandor rules (1,500 years), Four Pillars govern |
| **Aloria** | Aldric balances eleven scheming lords |
| **Veraheim** | Vera and Thaelen rule, dragon guards the peak |
| **Broken Isles** | Graza reigns, The Storm watches |

### Ongoing Tensions

- Drow genocide continues (400 years)
- No contact between dragons and elves
- Both empires depend on Veraheim's tunnel
- Cold war between Empire and Kingdom
- Broken Isles raid both powers' shipping

---
